data.description: Currency follows 3 strangers’ lives after each has a brief encounter with a young boy who has a penchant for writing on dollar bills.

data.title: LUCID: A JOURNEY THROUGH DREAMS by Joshua Bissonnette — Kickstarter
data.name: Joshua Bissonnette

data.title: UNIVERSAL LANGUAGE - finishing a short film by Kirsten Russell — Kickstarter
